name: Winter
summary: In the last of the Silly Symphonies season cycle, bears hibernate (or try to), raccoons sneeze, moose swim, and pretty much everyone ice skates. Everyone gathers around the groundhog to see what happens.
info:
• 中文名: 冬
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1930-10-30
  • 片长: 7m
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Burt Gillett
